game.title: Slayer of the Dragon
game.description: The once peaceful village of Dragon's Rest has been terrorized by a fearsome dragon. Slay the beast and restore peace to the village.

task.description: Speak to the villagers of Dragon's Rest to gather information about the Dragon's lair and its habits.
Obtain Draconium metal from the Draconium Mine and bring it to the village blacksmith.
Locate the Dragon's lair and engage in combat. Defeat the Dragon and bring its head as proof.
Return to Mayor of Dragon's Rest with the Dragon's head for reward.
